alert.note: Alert for Crane; Ector; Midland; Upton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ector, southwestern Midland, northeastern Crane and northwestern Upton Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 745 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of West Odessa, or 17 miles southwest of Odessa, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Odessa, West Odessa, Midland International Air and Space Port, Odessa Schlemeyer Field, Penwell, Warfield and Pleasant Farms. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 95 and 128. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for western Texas.
